name: Orbital (Demo)
description:
This is a small demo  thing (its not really a demo, just a sandbox that you'll get bored of in a few minutes) I made for the Playdate game console, where you navigate a ship around planets and their gravitational fields.

Also, its surprisingly hard to get into a stable orbit.

I might finish it the future, but likely not.

Feel free to steal code :)

(also, if you want to play this you either need the actual console, or the free official simulator! https://play.date/dev/)

The controls are pretty simple: crank to change direction, up and down for forward and backwards thrust.
